What opinions do you have on the fence Israel is building?
 
 Here are some links on the subject if your not familiar with it:
 
 
 http://www.cbsnews.com/stories/2003...ain576395.shtml
 
 http://www.globeandmail.com/servlet.../International/
 
 http://www.abc.net.au/am/content/2003/s958200.htm
 
 ------
 
 Anyways.... Discuss and Debate
 What do you think?
 
 Thanks for reading this
 
 Always Stay Open Minded

Let me pull out my crystal ball. I would like to see Israel have some form of security but I don't want them to encroach on land that should be given to the Palestinians. So, I hold out hope that the fence will help in the peace effort, but I think it might cause resentment.
 
 BTW, Good question SP.

If the security fence will do anything at all for helping stop the terrorism I think it is good. The media bias is taking this outta proportion. For example, go to this links that debunks some of that media bias:
 http://www.honestreporting.com/articles/critiques/Security_Fence_Scrutiny.asp (Security Fence Scrutiny)
 
 Basically the Palestinian critizism is that this fence is "annexing more land to Israel", and it separates different Palestinian areas giving them less control of the territories.
 
 Any counters on that? ...... Since I haven't really seen any.

 I think that is accurate to a degree. In the first place, currently all that land actually belongs to Israel. I don't think they have actually given it away just yet. 2nd, I think it would be necessary to put the fence in the place of encroachment if it is to be an effective security barrier. 
 
 i am uncertain if they have located all of the tunnels. There are many that run to egypt. Therefore, the fence will help but there needs to be more.
